summary: This document is a series of Citibank account statements for account 9995770951 belonging to 'SLK DESIGNS' from November 2011 to September 2012. The statements show a $10,000 deposit, routine activity including a wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein, and the eventual closure of the account. It is marked as confidential evidence from the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the sender of a funds transfer/wire to the SLK DESIGNS account on March 13, 2012.

events.title: Initial $10,000 deposit to SLK DESIGNS account
events.description: A $10,000.00 deposit is made to the Citibank account 9995770951 held by SLK DESIGNS.

events.title: Wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A funds transfer/wire from Jeffrey Epstein in the amount of $5,744.57 is credited to the SLK DESIGNS account.

events.title: SLK DESIGNS account closed
events.description: The Citibank account 9995770951 held by SLK DESIGNS is closed out with a final withdrawal of $9,788.80, leaving a zero balance.

locations: 301 E 66TH ST Suite 14G NEW YORK NY 10022-1565
keyFacts: A Citibank account in the name of 'SLK DESIGNS' received a $5,744.57 wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein on March 13, 2012.
The SLK DESIGNS account was located at 301 E 66th St, Suite 14G, New York, NY, an address associated with Epstein's network.
The account statements are marked as confidential evidence from the Southern District of New York (SDNY), indicating their use in the investigation.
The account was active from at least December 2011 until its closure in August 2012, showing limited transactional activity.
The document establishes a direct financial link between Jeffrey Epstein and the entity 'SLK DESIGNS'.
